nodes.beat: Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant Roman scholar, becomes fascinated by the idea of creating life.
Victor creates a creature using alchemy and stolen body parts.
The creature, horrified by his own appearance, runs away into the Roman wilderness.
The creature learns about Roman society by observing a family from a distance.
The creature saves a Roman girl from a wolf, but is attacked by villagers.
The creature confronts Victor, demanding a female companion.
Victor agrees but then destroys the female creature out of fear.
In revenge, the creature kills Victor's best friend and his bride.
Victor chases the creature to the Arctic, where he dies from exhaustion.
The creature mourns Victor's death and disappears into the wilderness.
Victor creates a creature using forbidden dark magic and stolen body parts.
The creature learns about Roman society by observing gladiators in training.
The creature saves a gladiator from a lion, but is attacked by the crowd.
Victor agrees but then destroys the female creature out of fear of the power he has unleashed.
The creature mourns Victor's death and disappears into the Arctic wilderness.
Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant Roman scholar, becomes fascinated by the idea of creating life.
The creature learns about Roman society by observing a group of Roman soldiers.
The creature saves a Roman soldier from a bear, but is attacked by the other soldiers.
The creature confronts Victor, demanding a place in Roman society.
Victor refuses, fearing the consequences of his creation.
In revenge, the creature kills Victor's mentor and his bride.
Victor chases the creature to the Arctic, where he dies from exhaustion.
The creature mourns Victor's death and disappears into the Arctic wilderness.
Victor creates a creature using forbidden dark magic and stolen body parts.
The creature learns about Roman society by observing a group of Roman philosophers.
The creature saves a philosopher from a falling statue, but is attacked by the crowd.
The creature confronts Victor, demanding recognition as a sentient being.
Victor refuses, fearing the consequences of his creation.
In revenge, the creature kills Victor's teacher and his bride.
Victor chases the creature to the Arctic, where he dies from exhaustion.
The creature mourns Victor's death and disappears into the Arctic wilderness.
